name: 乔·齐亚贾

last_movies.title: 生物突击队 第一季

introduction: Joe Zieja is an American ex-USAF officer, now a voice actor and author in Los Angeles. Works include Fire Emblem Three Houses (Claude Von Riegan), Just Cause 4 (Cesar), Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins, (Fox McCloud), Fate/Apocrypha, (Achilles) and many other anime and video game roles, as well as sidekick Issei Hoshino in Yakuza: Judgment. He is the author of the Epic Failure Trilogy, a whimsical, military sci-fi series described as "Terry Pratchett in space."
